mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( user_type, user_name, user_address, user_email, user_phone ) VALUES ( #{userType}, #{userName}, #{userAddress}, #{userEmail}, #{userPhone} )

INSERT INTO TASK ( user_id, task_name, task_status_code, task_contract_address, task_purpose, task_framework, task_data_type, task_max_trainer, task_port ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{taskName}, #{taskStatusCode}, #{taskContractAddress}, #{taskPurpose}, #{taskFramework}, #{taskDataType}, #{taskMaxTrainer}, #{taskPort} )
INSERT INTO TASK_PARTICIPATE ( task_id, user_id, data_path ) VALUES ( #{taskId}, #{userId}, #{dataPath} )
